Module.Name: iris-flaskblog
Module.Description: Realworld Application using Flask, SQLAlchemy, and InterSystems IRIS
Module.AfterInstallMessage: The project is installed. Go to directory cd ${libdir}${packagename} set the environment variable if necessary python3 -m venv env source env/bin/activate # for Linux source env/Scripts/activate # for Windows pip3 install -r requirements.txt if necessary, correct the IRIS access parameters in the file ${libdir}${packagename}/website/myconfig.py run the application python3 app.py
